ch0095_40_cattleya/0101_0701_01_10:
Hello, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
How lovely of you to drop by just as I was
starting to grow bored.
ch0095_40_cattleya/0101_0701_02_10:
A battle with you should liven things up. Would
you like to be my opponent?
ch0095_40_cattleya/7101_0701_01_10:
I enjoy adding a bit of dark, gothic flair to my
wardrobe every now and again.
ch0095_40_cattleya/7101_0701_02_10:
This dress makes me feel like the lady of some
grand, mysterious manor, hiding silently in
the shadows.
ch0095_40_cattleya/7101_0701_03_10:
When it’s time to sleep, I always find my way
back to my coffin... *giggle*
ch0095_40_cattleya/7102_0701_01_10:
Sableye prefer to dwell in dark places where they
can dig up rocks and gemstones from the ground
and eat them.
ch0095_40_cattleya/7102_0701_02_10:
In fact, all the gems in their diet transformed
their eyes into gemstones! Or so I’ve been told.
ch0095_40_cattleya/7102_0701_03_10:
Try looking into Sableye’s eyes. The way they
sparkle almost puts me in a trance... So beautiful.
ch0095_40_cattleya/7103_0701_01_10:
I’ve always been quite frightened by both Dark-
and Ghost-type Pokémon.
ch0095_40_cattleya/7103_0701_02_10:
That is, until I met Sableye and fell completely
under her spell.
ch0095_40_cattleya/7103_0701_03_10:
In facing my fears, I feel I’ve grown stronger
than I was before.
ch0095_40_cattleya/7104_0701_01_10:
*yawn* Who’s there? Who is so uncouth as to
disturb my sleep?
ch0095_40_cattleya/7104_0701_03_10:
There’s only one way to deal with rude Trainers...
Jump out of the dark and scare them when they
least expect it!
ch0095_40_cattleya/7105_0701_01_10:
I’ve given Cynthia an open invitation to stay at my
villas whenever she likes. I own several all over
the globe.
ch0095_40_cattleya/7105_0701_02_10:
She borrows them fairly often when training and
performing her research.
ch0095_40_cattleya/7105_0701_03_10:
I’d love to invite you to one of my villas as well
someday, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0095_40_cattleya/7105_0701_04_10:
We could even have Cynthia teach us a few
lessons while we’re there.
ch0095_40_cattleya/1701_0701_01_10: My Pokémon found quite a lavish gift for you.
ch0095_40_cattleya/1701_0701_02_10: Feel free to use it however you please.
ch0095_40_cattleya/1701_0702_01_10: Watching you grow is quite fun for me.
ch0095_40_cattleya/1701_0702_02_10: I hope you’ll strive to be even more elegant.
ch0095_40_cattleya/2501_0701_01_10: I have a butler named Darach.
ch0095_40_cattleya/2501_0701_02_10:
I greatly appreciate all that he does for me on a
day-to-day basis...
ch0095_40_cattleya/2501_0701_03_10:
but I do wish he would take a bit more time
for himself.
ch0095_40_cattleya/2501_0702_01_10: How would you like to be my butler?
ch0095_40_cattleya/2501_0702_02_10:
With you as my second butler, Darach may feel
more comfortable taking some time off.
ch0095_40_cattleya/2501_0702_03_10:
*giggle* Oh, relax... It was only a joke.
Though having you around as my butler does
sound like fun.
ch0095_40_cattleya/2511_0701_01_10: Erika always finds the best places to nap.
ch0095_40_cattleya/2511_0701_02_10:
I’ve curled up in a few of her favorite spots
and slept like a baby each time.
ch0095_40_cattleya/2511_0702_01_10:
Would you like to stop by one of Erika’s napping
spots sometime? I’m sure she wouldn’t mind a
visit from you.
ch0095_40_cattleya/3001_0701_01_10:
*yawn* They say that getting sunshine in the
morning is good for you, but I prefer to linger
in my dreams a bit longer...
ch0095_40_cattleya/3003_0701_01_10:
Ah, there you are! Please, save me from this
boring afternoon with a Pokémon battle.
ch0095_40_cattleya/3005_0701_01_10:
I think it’s time I went to bed... *yawn*
But I imagine I’ll be seeing you again soon
in my dreams.
